title: (x) DINesque Grotesk w/ single-storey a - Typ 1451 or similar {Florian}
content:
hi could someone please help me identify this font? thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202012423im_/http:/typophile.com/files/111_3811.jpg)
author: simundo

comments.content: Its difficult to tell from afar, but it looks like Faricy by Chris Dickinson.

I think it is rather [Typ 1451, DIN 17 or Gravostyle](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202012423/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50965) â€“ or another DIN style.  
F
